# The `MCSectionCOFF` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This represents a section on Windows. <a href="#details">More...</a>

### COMDATSymbol {#a4c7c2dfa4613b3948dff027009730b7f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MCSymbol&#42; llvm::MCSectionCOFF::COMDATSymbol</>}>
The COMDAT symbol of this section.

Only valid if this is a COMDAT section. Two COMDAT sections are merged if they have the same COMDAT symbol.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcsectioncoff-h/#l00044">44</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcsectioncoff-h">MCSectionCOFF.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="int llvm::MCSectionCOFF::Selection"
  labels = {["mutable"]}>
This is the Selection field for the section symbol, if it is a COMDAT section (Characteristics &amp; IMAGE&#95;SCN&#95;LNK&#95;COMDAT) != 0.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcsectioncoff-h/#l00048">48</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcsectioncoff-h">MCSectionCOFF.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### WinCFISectionID {#a36f9a538ffbba6956b5d74c22729e51f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::MCSectionCOFF::WinCFISectionID = ~0U"
  labels = {["mutable"]}>
The unique IDs used with the .pdata and .xdata sections created internally by the assembler.

This <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> is used to ensure that for every .text section, there is exactly one .pdata and one .xdata section, which is required by the Microsoft incremental linker. This data is mutable because this <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> is not notionally part of the section.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcsectioncoff-h/#l00040">40</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcsectioncoff-h">MCSectionCOFF.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
